# config

m etc/conf
# etc/hotplug.d/default		uhm? etc/hotplug.d is missing anyway
m etc/skel

# sysvinit (here?!)
#
m etc/rc.d
l etc/rc.d/init.d ../init.d
m etc/rc.d/rcX.d
m etc/rc.d/rc0.d
m etc/rc.d/rc1.d
m etc/rc.d/rc2.d
m etc/rc.d/rc3.d
m etc/rc.d/rc4.d
m etc/rc.d/rc5.d
m etc/rc.d/rc6.d

# For our package management system
#
m var/adm
m var/adm/flists
# var/adm/cksums	this is deprecated
m var/adm/md5sums
m var/adm/packages
m var/adm/dependencies
# new
m var/adm/postinstall

# compatibility
l etc/postinstall.d ../var/adm/postinstall
